1.content:
Link races off after saving the day he told Zelda it's cos he has unfinished hero business but the real reason he had a tiny powerless Vati in his shoe.

Faraway from everyoe Link took off his boot and poped Vati out

Vati was out of breath the smell was terrible and he couldn't stop the cheese entering his mouth.

As Vati caught his breath Link grabbed him

"unhand me" he demanded!

"Or what?" Link enquired

"..."

"You've lost your powers havn't you?" Link laughed

"Silence" He yelled but Link wasn't going to let this opportunity slip away



"y-you will pay for this!"

Link flicked him and he went across the grass

"Listen here pipsquick I'm the ruler here and your life is mine now! and I'm going to prove it"

Link picks him up and grabs a tooth pick from his items

"S-stop this humiliation at once" "No! please stop!" he yells with more panic when he realised where the toothpick is going

Link takes the pick and aims it at Vati's butt hole then..jams it in

"OH MY GAWD!!!" he screams Link then goes to remove it but Vati yells

"TWIST THAT SHIT IN MY ASSHOLE!!" in a primal voice over taken by hormones

Link hadn't expected this....but was nonetheless enjoying this. He then twists and pokes his boypussy harder

"FUCK" he yells as his tiny dick sprays cum on his hand

.."leave it in" he says exusted

"who knew BIG bad Vati was a faggy!!" Link taunted

Now I should..
1.title: Finders keepers!

info.brief_description: After Minish Camp Link finds a powerless tiny Vati and keeps him
info.description: Link finds a powerless Vati and anything goes!
